text.autoconfig.levelclear.title: Mod Config
text.autoconfig.levelclear.option.trigge: Specify the item IDs required to clear the level. Multiple items can be added.
Specify the advancement IDs required to clear the level. Multiple advancements can be added.
text.autoconfig.levelclear.option.chatMe: The message displayed in the chat when the level is cleared (<player> will be replaced with the player's name). If left empty, the message from the JSON language file will be used.
text.autoconfig.levelclear.option.destro: Whether to enable the option to delete the game save upon exiting. If true, the save will be deleted after exiting the game.
text.autoconfig.levelclear.option.minPla: Minimum Players to Destroy Game Save
The minimum number of players required to trigger the deletion of the game save.
text.autoconfig.levelclear.option.messag: The time interval (in milliseconds) between sending messages.
text.autoconfig.levelclear.option.delete: The number of retry attempts when deleting the world.
text.autoconfig.levelclear.option.retryD: The delay time (in milliseconds) between retry attempts.
text.autoconfig.levelclear.option.showMu: (For developers) Whether to output bilingual logs (Chinese and English) simultaneously.
